name: TVTropes Cleaner -spoilers
description: TVTropes Cleaner, only it doesn't highlight spoilers.
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("tvtropes.org") { iframe, #wikicmds, ins, #watchmsg { display: none !important; } registrytoken .namespacebuttons { display: none !important; } #wikibody, .indent, #wikileftpage * { font-family: Tahoma !important; font-size: 11px !important; } #wikibody a { color: #333333 !important; padding: 0px 2px 0px 2px !important; background-color: #dde0ff !important; } #wikitext ul li { padding: 2px 0 2px 0 !important; border-right: 0 !important; } em { padding: 0 2px 0 0 !important; } li span.asscaps{ font-variant: small-caps; font-size: 11px !important; } }
